title: Please ffs riot, do something about match making its broken as FU CK
body: I haven't been able to find similarly skilled players all night, just smurf smurf smurf try hards who've clearly played for years and here I am new asf trying to just play 1 fucking game, all i've got is 4 games I've afk'd or feed on purpose because unevenly matched to the point intentionally feeding is only slightly worse. Sort it out ffs.

replies.body: Better yet grow a fuc king pair Riot and start punishing those ruining it for people looking to learn who smurf. Or just Fix the fuc king match making system, you make it look hard.
